page.title: 19WESTBOURNE
page.content:
Westbourne is a quiet village about three miles east of the Borough of Havant. Much of the community consists of middle / upper class people. There are few amenities, but all the same it is a picture of a Sussex village.
To the north of the village and south of the Stansted Estate are the Brickkiln Ponds. This area was originally the supply of clay for the local brick works.One of these ponds is at present being cleaned out for use as a nature reserve for water birds, etc. It is hoped that the rest of these ponds will be used for the same purpose.
